titles.title: Farm and Small Business Expensing Tax Relief Act
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide an elective safe harbor for the expensing by small businesses of the costs of acquiring or producing tangible property.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 4/10/2014--Introduced. Farm and Small Business Expensing Tax Relief Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a business taxpayer whose average annual gross receipts during the preceding three taxable years do not exceed $10,000 and who has written accounting procedures for the expensing of tangible property in effect an election to expense up to $5,000 of the costs incurred to acquire or produce any item of tangible property.
